catalog_script_client.script: function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) { if (isLoading || newValue == '') { return; } try { var policy_list = sessionStorage['snapshot_policy']; var list = JSON.parse(policy_list); for (var i = 0; i < list.length; i++) { var local_rule = sessionStorage[list[i] + '_snapshot_policy']; var a = JSON.parse(local_rule); g_form.setDisplay(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule', 'true'); g_form.setReadOnly(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule', 'false'); for (var j = 0; j < a.length; j++) { if (a[j].status.uuid + '' == newValue + '') { var val = a[j].status.resources.app_protection_rule_list[0].local_snapshot_retention_policy.snapshot_expiry_policy.multiple + ''; } } if (val + '' == '0') { g_form.clearOptions(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule'); g_form.addOption(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule', 'Snapshots have no expiry', 'Snapshots have no expiry'); g_form.setValue(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule', 'Snapshots have no expiry'); } else { g_form.clearOptions(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule'); g_form.addOption(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule', 'Snapshots expire in ' + val + ' days', 'Snapshots expire in ' + val + ' days'); g_form.setValue(list[i] + '_snapshot_local_rule', 'Snapshots expire in ' + val + ' days'); } } } catch (e) { console.log('Error inside Local rule on change of policy ' + e.message); } }
